remarks: The ` psi ` and ` theta ` functions are asymptotic to each other, so is sufficient to prove either ` theta ( x ) / x ~~>r 1 ` or ` psi ( x ) / x ~~>r 1 ` to establish the PNT. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Apr-2016.)
statement: chpchtlim $p |- ( x e. ( 2 [,) +oo ) |-> ( ( psi ` x ) / ( theta ` x ) ) ) ~~>r 1 $.
